name: Covid 19 Defence
description: Covid-19 Defense is a remake of the classic 1978 arcade game Space Invaders. In the game you play the role of a commander of super advanced artillery and your task is to destroy the enemy before it can reach the ground. At the moment, the full version of the game offers 50 levels of increasing difficulty, physics responsible for the dynamic disintegration of enemies, four difficulty modes, hand-drawn graphics and retro-style music. In the game, you can improve your artyllery for points that you earn for completed levels. Improvements have a key role in the game, points can be freely distributed at each workshop visit. The game is planned for all platforms. Cheers and hope you like the demo.
